other_tests.findings: Dilated blood vessels with intravascular erythrocytes and surrounding smooth muscle; findings consistent with arteriovenous hemangioma.
Epidermal hyperkeratosis and acanthosis with dilated thin-walled spaces without erythrocytes in the papillary dermis; findings consistent with lymphangiokeratoma.
Variation in fiber size and mononuclear cell infiltration among the muscle bundles; interpreted as slight muscle disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Serial section did not reveal any lipid deposition.

other_tests.findings: Normal findings indicating lack of structural and numerical chromosome abnormalities.
Punctate cystic changes in the long tubular bones, right-sided rotoscoliosis, slight scalloping in the posterior L2-L4 vertebrae, and compact enostosis in the right talus.
Findings of axonal neuropathy; low peroneal compound muscle action potential amplitude and prolongation of the motor unit action potential in certain muscles.
